topPRs.title: feat(op-acceptance-tests): ci; parallel sysgo

topPRs.body:
## Description
Run the sysgo acceptance tests in parallel across multiple machines.

### Commits
- **feat(op-acceptance-tests): ci; build caching.**
- **feat(op-acceptance-tests): ci; parallelise sysgo.**

## Metadata
- Fixes https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17525

topPRs.title: dependabot(gomod): bump github.com/prometheus/client_golang from 1.22.0 to 1.23.2
topPRs.author: dependabot
topPRs.body:
Bumps [github.com/prometheus/client_golang](https://github.com/prometheus/client_golang) from 1.22.0 to 1.23.2.
Release notes

Sourced from github.com/prometheus/client_golang's releases.

v1.23.2 - 2025-09-05

This release is made to upgrade to prometheus/common v0.66.1, which drops the dependencies github.com/grafana/regexp and go.uber.org/atomic and replaces gopkg.in/yaml.v2 with go.yaml.in/yaml/v2 (a drop-in replacement). There are no functional changes.

  • [release-1.23] Upgrade to prometheus/common@v0.66.1 by @â€‹aknuds1 in prometheus/client_golang#1869
  • [release-1.23] Cut v1.23.2 by @â€‹aknuds1 in prometheus/client_golang#1870

Full Changelog: https://github.com/prometheus/client_golang/compare/v1.23.1...v1.23.2

v1.23.1 - 2025-09-04

This release is made to be compatible with a backwards incompatible API change in prometheus/common v0.66.0. There are no functional changes.

  • [release-1.23] Upgrade to prometheus/common v0.66 by @â€‹aknuds1 in prometheus/client_golang#1866
  • [release-1.23] Cut v1.23.1 by @â€‹aknuds1 in prometheus/client_golang#1867

Full Changelog: https://github.com/prometheus/client_golang/compare/v1.23.0...v1.23.1

v1.23.0 - 2025-07-30

  • [CHANGE] Minimum required Go version is now 1.23, only the two latest Go versions are supported from now on. #1812
  • [FEATURE] Add WrapCollectorWith and WrapCollectorWithPrefix #1766
  • [FEATURE] Add exemplars for native histograms #1686
  • [ENHANCEMENT] exp/api: Bubble up status code from writeResponse #1823
  • [ENHANCEMENT] collector/go: Update runtime metrics for Go v1.23 and v1.24 #1833
  • [BUGFIX] exp/api: client prompt return on context cancellation #1729

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from github.com/prometheus/client_golang's changelog.

1.23.2 / 2025-09-05

This release is made to upgrade to prometheus/common v0.66.1, which drops the dependencies github.com/grafana/regexp and go.uber.org/atomic and replaces gopkg.in/yaml.v2 with go.yaml.in/yaml/v2 (a drop-in replacement). There are no functional changes.

1.23.1 / 2025-09-04

This release is made to be compatible with a backwards incompatible API change in prometheus/common v0.66.0. There are no functional changes.

1.23.0 / 2025-07-30

  • [CHANGE] Minimum required Go version is now 1.23, only the two latest Go versions are supported from now on. #1812
  • [FEATURE] Add WrapCollectorWith and WrapCollectorWithPrefix #1766
  • [FEATURE] Add exemplars for native histograms #1686
  • [ENHANCEMENT] exp/api: Bubble up status code from writeResponse #1823
  • [ENHANCEMENT] collector/go: Update runtime metrics for Go v1.23 and v1.24 #1833
  • [BUGFIX] exp/api: client prompt return on context cancellation #1729
Commits
  • 8179a56 Cut v1.23.2 (#1870)
  • 4142b59 Merge pull request #1869 from prometheus/arve/upgrade-common
  • 4ff40f0 Cut v1.23.1 (#1867)
  • 989b029 Upgrade to prometheus/common v0.66 (#1866)
  • e4b2208 Cut v1.23.0 (#1848)
  • d9492af cut v1.23.0-rc.1 (#1842)
  • aeae8a0 Cut v1.23.0-rc.0 (#1837)
  • b157309 Update common Prometheus files (#1832)
  • a704e28 build(deps): bump the github-actions group with 3 updates (#1826)
  • c774311 Fix errNotImplemented reference (#1835)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

topPRs.title: fix: increase system owner funding to resolve insufficient funds error in operator fee tests
topPRs.author: DeVikingMark
topPRs.body:
## Problem
TestOperatorFeeDevstack fails with "insufficient funds for gas * price + value" error in Eris environment.

## Root Cause
System owner funding of 0.1 ETH is insufficient for L1 transaction costs (~0.024 ETH + gas price fluctuations).

## Solution
Increase system owner funding from `eth.OneTenthEther` (0.1 ETH) to `eth.Ether(1)` (1 ETH) in:
- `op-acceptance-tests/tests/isthmus/operator_fee/operator_fee_test.go`
- `op-acceptance-tests/tests/jovian/min_base_fee_test.go`

Fixes #17387

topPRs.title: fix runEndToEndBootstrapAndApplyUpgradeTest test
topPRs.author: AmadiMichael
topPRs.body: The cuurent runEndToEndBootstrapAndApplyUpgradeTest helper function creates a new sepolia fork (which it uses to call opcm functions instead of using the one that the implementations was deployed with. The tests were passing before because the address has no code on the new fork and so returns success.
